data.actual_result: It says they are streaming but no purple status streaming icon
data.expected_result: Your friend's status icon should be purple and say they are streaming
data.short_description: Streaming Status doesn't appear on Overlay DM list
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a friend in your DM list - Have them stream/go live on Twitch - Launch a game with an enabled Discord Overlay - Turn on your overlay - Click the Friends/Start A Call button and scroll to where your friend is on the list
